name: Line.Builder
description: The Line.Builder class provides a fluent interface for creating Line instances with method chaining.
overview:
The Line.Builder class allows you to construct Line objects through a chain of method calls, making the configuration process more readable and maintainable. Instead of passing multiple parameters to constructors, you can set properties individually using descriptive method names.

The builder is typically obtained through the Draw2D.line() method and provides two final operations:
- build() - Creates the Line instance
- buildAndAdd() - Creates the Line instance and automatically adds it to the Draw2D context

methods.name: pos
methods.description: Sets the start and end positions of the line in a single call.

parameters.name: x1
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line start point

parameters.name: y1
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line start point

parameters.name: x2
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line end point

parameters.name: y2
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line end point

methods.name: pos1
methods.description: Sets the start position of the line.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line start point

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line start point

methods.name: pos2
methods.description: Sets the end position of the line.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line end point

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line end point

methods.name: x1
methods.description: Sets only the X coordinate of the line start point.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line start point

methods.name: y1
methods.description: Sets only the Y coordinate of the line start point.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line start point

methods.name: x2
methods.description: Sets only the X coordinate of the line end point.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line end point

methods.name: y2
methods.description: Sets only the Y coordinate of the line end point.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line end point

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the line color using RGB format with full alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the line color using RGB format with custom alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the line color using separate RGB values with full alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the line color using separate RGBA values.

methods.name: alpha
methods.description: Sets only the alpha transparency value while preserving RGB color.

methods.name: rotation
methods.description: Sets the rotation angle of the line (clockwise).

methods.name: rotateCenter
methods.description: Sets whether the line should rotate around its center point.

parameters.name: centerEnabled
parameters.description: true to rotate around center, false to rotate around origin

methods.name: width
methods.description: Sets the width (thickness) of the line.

methods.name: zIndex
methods.description: Sets the z-index for rendering order. Higher values render on top.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Creates the configured Line instance without adding it to the Draw2D context.

methods.name: buildAndAdd
methods.description: Creates the configured Line instance and automatically adds it to the Draw2D context.
examples:
const line = draw2D.line()
    .pos(0, 0, 100, 100)
    .color(0x00FF00)
    .width(3)
    .buildAndAdd(); // Automatically added to Draw2D context
